original_text: Adonijah and all the guests who were with him heard it as they were finishing their feast. On hearing the sound of the trumpet, Joab asked, “What’s the meaning of all the noise in the city?”
korean_text: 아도니야와 그와 함께 한 손님들이 먹기를 마칠 때에 다 들은지라 요압이 뿔나팔 소리를 듣고 이르되 어찌하여 성읍 중에서 소리가 요란하냐

sentences.original_text: Adonijah and all the guests who were with him heard it
sentences.korean_translation: 아도니야와 함께 있던 모든 손님들이 그 소리를 들었습니다

sentences.original_text: as they were finishing their feast
On hearing the sound of the trumpet
What's the meaning of all the noise in the city?
sentences.korean_translation: 성 안의 모든 소음은 무슨 의미입니까?
